GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/lessons.description: serves an array of all lessons for the given user

GET /api/lessons/notes.decription: serves an array of all notes for the given user

GET /api/lessons/:lesson_id/notes.decription: serves an array of all lesson notes for the given lesson and user

GET /api/practises.description: serves up an array of the practise sessions for the logged in user

GET /api/practises/notes.description: serves up an array of all the practise notes for the logged-in user

GET /api/practises/:practice_idnotes.description: serves up an array of practise notes for the given practice_id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users in the database. Password encrypted

GET /api/lessons/admin.description: Serves up an array of all lesson objects stored on database. Administrator privileges required.
